text: María de los Ángeles López Segovia (20 March 1937 – 20 August 2015), better known as Lina Morgan, was a Spanish actress and showgirl. She performed in movie, theatre, and television. She was known for her roles in Hostal Royal Manzanares (1996), Una de dos (1998) and Academia de baile Gloria (2001). ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Actors from Madrid Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish television actors
title: Lina Morgan
